title: Login Success for All User Roles
description: Check that users with valid credentials can successfully authenticate and are redirected to the correct dashboard or mobile app area based on their role (admin, company, carrier, driver, passenger).

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password for admin user
Click login button
Verify admin user is authenticated and redirected to /admin panel
Log out
Repeat login with valid company user credentials
Verify company user is authenticated and redirected to /empresa panel
Log out
Repeat login with valid carrier user credentials
Verify carrier user is authenticated and redirected to /transportadora panel
Log out
Repeat login with valid driver user credentials
Verify driver user is authenticated and redirected to mobile driver app
Log out
Repeat login with valid passenger user credentials
Verify passenger user is authenticated and redirected to mobile passenger app

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login attempts with invalid username or password fail with appropriate error messages without authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify login failed message is shown and user is not authenticated
Verify no redirection occurs

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Confirm that protected routes and API endpoints restrict access based on user roles and prevent unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login as company user
Attempt to access /admin route
Verify access is denied or redirected to company dashboard
Attempt to call admin-only API endpoint
Verify API returns unauthorized error
Repeat above steps with driver user attempting access to company and admin routes

title: Real-time Fleet Tracking Updates
description: Verify real-time retrieval and display of GPS locations updates for vehicles and routes on admin and carrier dashboards within 1 second delay.

steps.description: Login as admin
Open fleet map with route visualization
Simulate vehicle location updates via Supabase subscription
Verify map updates vehicle locations on screen within 1 second after update is pushed
Repeat the test logged in as carrier user on the carrier panel

title: CRUD Operations for Company Management
description: Test creating, reading, updating, and deleting companies, ensuring persistence of data and UI updates.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to companies management page
Create a new company with valid data
Verify company is saved and appears in list immediately
Edit existing company data with valid changes
Verify changes persist and are reflected in UI
Delete a company
Verify company is removed from database and no longer shown

title: Operational Alert Trigger and Notification
description: Verify alerts trigger correctly on route deviations, emergencies, or operational issues and appropriate notifications are sent to intended users.

steps.description: Login as admin
Simulate a route deviation event from a vehicle
Verify an operational alert is generated and visible on alerts badge
Verify notification is sent to the admin and carrier panels
Trigger an emergency assistance request from driver app
Verify emergency alert is dispatched and communication channel is opened between driver and admin

title: Mobile App Checklist and Boarding via QR/NFC
description: Test driver and passenger mobile app flows for completing checklists, scanning QR/NFC codes for embarkation, including offline fallback functionality.

steps.description: Login to driver mobile app
Complete pre-route checklist
Verify checklist completion is saved and synchronized
Scan passenger QR code for embarkation
Verify passenger boarding is recorded successfully
Turn off internet connection
Attempt QR/NFC scan again
Verify offline data is stored locally and syncs when connection is restored

title: Report Generation and Export
description: Validate that financial and operational reports generate correct aggregated data and export properly in PDF, Excel, and CSV formats.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to reports section
Generate financial report for selected period
Verify displayed data matches expected aggregated values
Export the report as PDF
Verify downloaded PDF file content is correct and properly formatted
Export the report as Excel
Verify downloaded Excel file contains accurate report data
Export as CSV when available
Verify CSV file correctness

title: Multi-Tenant Data Isolation Validation
description: Ensure users cannot access or query data belonging to other tenants, verifying row-level security policies and data segregation.

steps.description: Login as user from Company A
Attempt to query or access records belonging to Company B
Verify access is denied or no data returned
Simulate API calls or UI navigation to cross-tenant data
Confirm data isolation maintained across all entry points

title: Performance and Uptime Monitoring
description: Verify the system maintains above 99.9% uptime and p95 API response times are below 500ms under normal load.

steps.description: Monitor system for uptime using monitoring tools
Verify uptime is 99.9% or higher over monitoring period
Execute API load tests simulating normal user traffic
Verify 95th percentile API response time is under 500ms
Check recorded web vitals metrics and error logs
Ensure no critical errors or performance degradations reported

title: Address Autocomplete and Geocoding Validations
description: Validate that address inputs provide autocomplete suggestions, CEP lookup works correctly, and geocoding returns accurate coordinates.

steps.description: Focus an address input field
Type partial address or CEP
Verify address autocomplete suggestions appear
Select suggested address
Verify full address is populated in form fields
Trigger geocoding operation
Verify latitude and longitude coordinates returned and displayed correctly

title: Security Controls Verification - CSRF, Rate Limiting, Encryption
description: Confirm implementation of CSRF protections on forms, rate limiting on APIs, and encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest.

steps.description: Submit forms such as login and CRUD with missing or invalid CSRF token
Verify form submission is rejected due to CSRF protection
Simulate rapid API calls exceeding rate limits
Verify API requests are throttled or blocked with appropriate error
Inspect network traffic for encrypted transmission (e.g. HTTPS)
Verify sensitive information is not sent in plain text
Verify database storage encrypts sensitive user data
Confirm encryption at rest is applied according to specifications

title: UI Components Render and Interaction
description: Validate that key reusable UI components such as buttons, dialogs, dropdowns, tables, and toasts render correctly and interactions function as expected.

steps.description: Render UI components in isolation and inside pages
Verify visual appearance matches design specifications
Interact with components: click buttons, open dialogs, select dropdown items, interact with tables
Verify expected behaviors trigger and no visual or functional defects occur
Trigger toasts by actions
Verify toasts appear and dismiss properly
